headline: Wall Street braced for a private credit meltdown. The risk of one is rising
summary: Private credit is expected to grow from $3.4 trillion in 2025 to an estimated $4.9 trillion by 2029. Wall Street is starting to raise alarms about the risks.

headline: Blue Owl: I'm Doubling Down On This Dirt-Cheap, High-Yielding Asset Manager
summary: Blue Owl Capital (OWL) looks undervalued post sell-off, with strong margins, stable fee earnings and 5.5%+ yield. See here more details.
